doc.previous: For example for an ISBN 10 of 0 306 40615 2  The 2001 edition of the official manual of the International ISBN Agency says that the ISBN 10 check digit 26 which is the last digit of the ten digit ISBN must range from 0 to 10 the symbol X is used for 10 and must be such that the sum of all the ten digits each multiplied by its integer weight descending from 10 to 1 is a multiple of 11
doc.after: Formally using modular arithmetic we can say
